title: Tenable security advisory (AV26-149)
description: On February 18, 2026, Tenable published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following product. Included was a critical update for the following:
products: Tenable Security Center  version 6.7.2 w/ Patch SC-202602.1 and Patch SC-202602.2 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
